website_summaries.verdict: Though you may have some problems adjusting it to the perfect fit, once you do, chances are you will be impressed with this good-looking, budget-friendly watch.
pros: Sports a classy look with black watch face that complements the gold-tone stainless-steel casing and band
Rated to resist moisture up to 30 meters
Looks more costly than the inexpensive price
cons: The band is too long for most men, difficult to adjust, and doesn't come with instructions to help with the task

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS WATCH !
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch back in January but it was in the box on my dresser for months! I wore it to prom and it literally BROKE APART?! Such a cheap watch I am highly disappointed and would like a refund ! But the positive about this is that it looks nice ...
customer_reviews.author: LikPreme

customer_reviews.title: Love it bought one for my dad for his birthday ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it bought one for my dad for his birthday and I also got one for me looks classy and it feels good on my wrist.
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: Good Looking Budget Watch
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good looking watch for the price. When it got it, it was huge, so I had to take out 4 links in total. It's very light, and I prefer my watches on the heavier side, so this feels kind of cheap. If you're looking for a fancy looking watch on a budget, for a party or whatnot, then this is a pretty good watch.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Lambert

customer_reviews.title: NON STANDARD PINS TO INSTALL THE REPLACEMENT LEATHER BAND I HAD TO PURCHASE.
customer_reviews.text: My order state that I wanted an adjustable band for a small wrist. The band was adjustable but still too large. I removed the band and tried to replace it with a leather band from Amazon. THE SPRING BAND HOLDER ARE NON STANDARD! CAVEAT EMTOR
customer_reviews.author: TOM GLOVER

customer_reviews.title: It's a great watch. I love its the way it looks ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a great watch. I love its the way it looks like real gold and also I love how they make the seconds hand very small because I hardly even look at it. My only problem is that the watch is easy to brake, but only if you aren't careful with it. I accidentally took out my frustration on the wall and the watch band broke on me. But luckily I was able to get it fixed. However the watch band will start losing its color overtime, but it doesn't happen as fast as other watches. Also, the u boxing experience was top notch, I recommend this watch to anyone on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: Roshawn

customer_reviews.title: This watch looks really nice, however the band is a bit stiff and ...
customer_reviews.text: This watch looks really nice, however the band is a bit stiff and doesn't move as smoothly as a more expensive watch, but you get what you pay for. Overall, very nice. Also the band was a little big. May need to take out a link or two
customer_reviews.author: maura bramlitt

customer_reviews.title: low price & gold color
customer_reviews.text: ... nice price for gold watch with black dial ... weight & size of watch is adequate ... gold tone of watch & band is nice does not have copper tint ...
customer_reviews.author: Ken W

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for what you pay.
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty nice watch for $13, It looks good, and the second mini dial actually work. It's not heavy metal, but it's a $13 dollar watch and not a $100 dollar watch. I collect a lot of watches, and I say this is a good bang for the buck. You could for sell tor trade this to your friends for more than $13 dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable $15 dress watch
customer_reviews.text: Its has better build quality, good looks. Precision time keeping with Japanese design. Light weight design with water resistant. I like this watch and I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mathew

customer_reviews.title: Looks very slick
customer_reviews.text: This product looks very fancy for what it's worth! It is a little sharp on the edges right out of the box though but it's not too bad. Definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Keegan H

customer_reviews.title: Awesome watch!
customer_reviews.text: My husband absolutely loves the watch. He couldn't take his eyes off it! Highly recommend this watch. It's even better then the fossil watch i gave him.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Blaskowski

customer_reviews.title: N/A
customer_reviews.text: To large for my wrist. Very good looking watch for the price. Material that the band is made from is little edgy and sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Great looking watch that works well for cheap!
customer_reviews.text: Feels almost too light. But it is comfortable and it works and looks great! I like it a lot. A great dress watch for $15 ... you can't beat that value.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Christy

customer_reviews.title: Cannot size wrist band by removing links
customer_reviews.text: Only the clasp can be adjusted. Therefore it cannot be sized to fit other than a fairly large wrist. To the person who claims the month dial keep spinning around... that's because it's the second hand. There is no month indication, only the dau of the month. I am returning this due to inability to size it properly... A deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Donald L Smith

customer_reviews.title: For the price this a great watch. Baller on a budget
customer_reviews.text: For the price this a great watch. Baller on a budget. The one negative thing is the gold has dulled over the few months I’ve had it.
customer_reviews.author: Rick sharp

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Christmas Gift!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great watch. My brother was thoroughly please to receive this gifted watch. He loves it and was seriously surprised. This watch is of good quality. My brother said this is a perfect fit for him. Very classy and stylish!
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking Watch
customer_reviews.text: The watch looks great and after using it for a few weeks it keeps perfect time. I have received several compliments on the watch. Very reasonably priced watch!
customer_reviews.author: Michael R. Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for It's price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice & Fancy design to it. Doesn't fit me well but,Overall I very much so like this watch. The gold gives it a beautiful shine & It came packaged very nicely. Came in on time & No disappointments.
customer_reviews.author: Dr.JessicaLynn

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like this watch because the parts falls like autumn leaves on your arm while you walk. A waste of money.I'm very disappointed in the manufacturing process.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made. Had it for a week and it broke
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Great watch!!
customer_reviews.text: I was so worried about ordering a watch online for my husband and since he is very picky, it was a big risk I decided to take as a Christmas present. He and I both love it. It is so nice and real looking!
customer_reviews.author: mrsunderwood

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch
customer_reviews.text: Gave it for Xmas he loved it. The watch is beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Susan Green

customer_reviews.title: Band
customer_reviews.text: Must be able to take band apart to remove links if necessary to fit wrist. Not easy to do.
customer_reviews.author: JACK

customer_reviews.title: Cool classic watch
customer_reviews.text: Fine-looking watch. Looking at your iPhone for the time is so last year.
customer_reviews.author: Robert the smart buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this watch. Its actually very classy looking . Fast Delivery and received before Christmas as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara T

customer_reviews.title: Good watch
customer_reviews.text: Great watch. the battery died after a year I can't find a replacement battery.
customer_reviews.author: F. Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful wrist watch
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful wrist watch!! It keeps correct time. Its dial is very pretty look at it.It has certainly rich classic look with gold and black combination. It adds to style on any cloths either formal or causal wear.
customer_reviews.author: SandhyaKopparaju

customer_reviews.title: Lousy quartz movement and very easy to break
customer_reviews.text: Chinsy watch. Lousy quartz movement and very easy to break. Bump your wrist on something and it falls apart.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Hollister

customer_reviews.title: Watch
customer_reviews.text: Good item at a good price, but the band is very hard to adjust the length.

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and great everyday watch.
customer_reviews.text: Band fits good. Looks far better than the price would indicate. Gold hands and hours easy to read against black face plate.

customer_reviews.title: Looks fancy
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, but was waaay to big for me even though I have small wrist.
customer_reviews.author: BG

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy.... check the type of crystal a watch has before buying.
customer_reviews.text: The watch keeps correct time but I would not buy it again because the crystal is cheap. I bought another watch in the same price range and it has a much clearer crystal. This watch would be a lot better if the crystal was not a cheap plastic that appears blurry.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce W.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing even the lil dial works! It even has to adjust the links very good! 👍 👍 👍

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking Watch !
customer_reviews.text: Watch feels nice to the touch , and looks even better in person than in pictures , would buy again .

customer_reviews.title: Broken hand after two days
customer_reviews.text: One of the hands came loose inside the watch..about after two days of use.....now doesn't work. Waste of money

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good looking works well and i was looking for light weight watch. so it fit the bill.

customer_reviews.title: Boyfriend loves it
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my boyfriend and he loves it. Kinda want to order one for myself now.

customer_reviews.title: Weak link pins
customer_reviews.text: The watch functions good, and looks good. However, the link pins are weak and bend easily; causing the band to disconnect.

customer_reviews.title: badly disappointed
customer_reviews.text: gave to my son for Christmas, couple hours after the clasp broke. i tried to get it fixed or replaced but can't. what a waste of money. disappointed badly.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: This watch fits a little too big for me, but I have small wrists so I didn't mind. Overall very nice product would buy again!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The watch is good for the price. I just buy the watch for my friend as a gift.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking watch and feels like good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking watch and feels like good quality. Looks great and my son loves it.

customer_reviews.text: Super value. You should either buy a kit to size the band or have a jeweler do it. Kits are only about $10 and you can use it to size the band and change the battery etc.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work when it arrived.
customer_reviews.text: The watch didn't work when it arrived. The battery was already dead and on a watch with such a cheap price point, it's not even worth it to get a replacement battery. The watch looked good but it is incredibly lightweight, almost too lightweight. I tried it on and felt like it was going to fall off of my wrist.

customer_reviews.title: LOOKS/FEELS/SMELLS/TASTES LIKE EXCELLENCE

customer_reviews.title: Nice but .......

customer_reviews.title: Wasted potential
customer_reviews.text: The battery died by the time it got to my house. I tried resetting the time but none of the hands moved. Not even the seconds hand would tick. It is stuck on day 12 and is permanently set at 5:56 and 27 secons. What a waste of $17.

product_meta.title: Fanmis Men's Luxury Analog Quartz Gold Wrist Watches Business Stainless Steel Band Dress Wrist Watch Classic Calendar Date Window 3ATM Water Resistant
product_meta.description:
Product Description 
Highlights: 
Original Japanese Movement: provide precise and accurate time keeping 
Stainless Steel Strap and Stainless Steel Case Cover 
German High Hardness Mineral Glass, not easy to wear 
30M Water Resistant - 3ATM: Daily Use Waterproof, Handwash 
Calendar Date Window 
Classic Business Casual Dress Watch Design. Combines quality, leading edge fashion, and value. 

Features 
Stainless Steel case and Stainless Steel case back 
German High Hardness Mineral Glass 
Calendar Date Window 
30M Waterproof 
Stainless Steel Strap 

Specification: 
Dial Color: Black 
Dial Case Diameter: 1.57 inch / 4.0 cm 
Dial Case Thickness: 0.43 inch / 1.1 cm 
Band Color: Gold 
Band Width: 0.79 inch / 2 cm 
Band Length: 8.7 inch / 22 cm. 
Band Clasp Type: Fold Over Clasp 
Watch Weight: 3.39 oz / 96 g 

**NOTE**: 
If mist or droplets found inside watch surface, please contact manufacturer immediately. 
Clean the strap by a soft cloth on regular bases is highly recommended. 
Too much water contact will shorter watch life. 

What Is In The Package: 
Watch x 1

 * Package Dimensions :3.2 x 2.8 x 2.4 inches; 3.99 Ounces

feature_bullets: PRECISE TIME KEEPING: Japanese Movement, provide precise and accurate time keeping. Japanese battery which can provide the watch strong power.

CLASSIC BUSINESS CASUAL DESIGN: Double Locking Fold Over Clasp, use more convenient, more difficult to fall off, more fashionable appearance. Stainless Steel Band Strap / Case, bring you back to the fashion and luxury. Also make it a great gift for family or friends
German High Hardness Mineral Glass: The glass imported from Germany. German high hardness glass, not easy to wear. Key Scratch Resistant Watch Face, the glass is extremely hard and pressure-tolerant.

STAINLESS STEEL with DURABLE and COMFORT: key scratch resistant watch face, stainless steel water proof case cover make it super durable, smooth polished stainless steel band strap provide wear resistant and comfortable wearing experience.
Water resistant up to 3 ATM (Suitable for everyday use. Splash/rain resistant.NOT suitable for diving, swimming, snorkeling, water-related work)
